entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
